showImgSize.description: The image size control appears when you click on an image
showImgSize.description_zh: 点击图片时显示图片大小控件

showImgToolbar.description: The toolbar controls appear when you click on an image
showImgToolbar.description_zh: 点击图片时显示工具栏控件

showImgResize.description: When you click on an image, the modify size controls appear
showImgResize.description_zh: 点击图片时显示修改尺寸控件

onReady.description: Triggered when editor initialization is complete
onReady.description_zh: 编辑器初始化完成时触发

onFocus.description: Triggered when the editor is focused

onBlur.description: 编辑器失去焦点时触发detail = { html, text, delta }
onBlur.description_zh: 编辑器失去焦点时触发detail = { html, text, delta }

onInput.description: 编辑器内容改变时触发detail = { html, text, delta }
onInput.description_zh: 编辑器内容改变时触发detail = { html, text, delta }

onStatusChange.description: Triggered when changing an in-editor style via the Context method returns the style that the selection has set
onStatusChange.description_zh: 通过 Context 方法改变编辑器内样式时触发，返回选区已设置的样式
